banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Finding your personal mission in life
videoData.socialTitle: Finding your personal mission in life

nodes.whoTheyAre: A former Partner at BCG, Philip Krinks is a Deacon in the Church of England and currently Assistant Curate at St Mary’s Battersea in London, where he shares in the spiritual care of a diverse urban community. He is the Founder and Chairman of St. Martin’s Affordable Finance Development, a charity devoted to developing solutions for the high-cost credit market in the UK, driven by a Christian ethos.

videoData.description: Philip Krinks was happy and successful in his job as a management consultant. He was challenged and passionate about the work. But something was missing. Was this career being true to his personal mission? Krinks drew on a reflective walk in the country and embarked on a larger journey that led from a corporate job to a post as a Christian pastor. He charts that journey and offers insight and lessons on identifying one's path in life and work.
videoData.socialDescription: Philip Krinks was happy and successful in his job as a management consultant. He was challenged and passionate about the work. But something was missing. He charts that journey and offers insight and lessons on identifying one's path in life and work.
